org.jvnet.flamingo.bcb.ui
Class ScrollablePopup

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  org.jvnet.flamingo.bcb.ui.ScrollablePopup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class ScrollablePopup
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu

Scrollable popup. If there are more menus than the size specified, two "scroller menus" will appear at the top and bottom. NOTE: to add menus, only use the method add(Action a) like that: JMenuItem item = getPopup().add(action); if (item != null) { item.set...; } Creation date: Nov 13, 2003

See Also:
Serialized Form
